aircraft.value: Griffin Guard - AC-4044-589 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Communication radio frequency drift. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 19/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 20/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 23/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 22/08/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 25/08/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Communication radio frequency drift. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
